tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  message TEXT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT,
  sentiment_category VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE chatbot_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    response_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE chat_history (
    chat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    chat_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    chat_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE emotion_categories (
    emotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    emotion_name VARCHAR(50),
    emotion_description TEXT
)
